name: Styx West
description:
Bad news, you're DEAD, good news, this is not the end for you ! Come aboard the Styx West, the one and only way to reach the kingdom of the deads trhough the Styx desert (???). 

You have to take control of the train by maintaining fuel, steam pressure, stay on the right track, defend the train against the merciless attackers and repair if if necessary !

Lucky you, everything you need to know about the train is indicated on board !!

Will you manage to reach the end of this cursed railroad and finally rest in peace ?

*spoiler/hints ahead*

- Keep the fire in the boiler running to increase the pressure in the engine.

- Keep the pressure in the green area to maximize your speed.

- If you get in the red, pull the chain to release some pressure.

- When you hear traffic sounds, it means an intersection is coming, make sure to stay away from the side with the signs using the lever.

- You have a 3 rounds winchester with you, use it to take down the demonic souls.

- Repair the train with your wrench, you can see it's health on the left in the engine room.

- In each wagon, there's an indicator telling you have much there is left
